# OneNoteProxy.SectionChooser method

Open the OneNote _QuickFiling_ to let the user choose a section.

```csharp
public string SectionChooser(Window owner, string description)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| owner | The window that owns this section chooser dialog. |
| description | Purpose of the selection. |

## Return Value

The OneNote ID of the chosen section.
